REQ_Description: Users should be able to create and manage work orders with various priorities and attachments
System should support comprehensive work order assignment including technicians assignment and labor tracking
System should provide full asset lifecycle management with hierarchical relationships and condition monitoring
System should maintain accurate inventory tracking with support for multiple storerooms and automated reordering
System should enable preventive maintenance scheduling based on calendar dates and meter readings
System should generate comprehensive reports for assets performance and maintenance history
System should support purchase requisition and purchase order management
System should provide role-based security and access control across all modules
System should support service request management and track request fulfillment
System should enable configuration of business processes and workflows
